name: framesofthesource/wraith-php
description: Wraith is a lightning-fast, lightweight API mocking tool that takes the hassle out of API dependencies so you can focus on what you do best: coding. With Wraith, you can spin up realistic API responses in seconds, creating a seamless development and testing environment without ever waiting on a live server. It also helps you with testing, helping you create Mock API endpoints for your scenarios! Install Wraith and start coding!
